QuestData.Title: Hatred Undying
QuestData.Description: The blood of the dead god, Sethe, lingers in the pools here. And with it, his hatred of Rukhmar and Anzu.$B$BSo strong was this hate that it animates the blood even now, eons after he was slain by his fellow gods.$B$BI need the congealed blood that holds those spiteful creatures together.$B$BThere is nothing the Adherents fear more than the power of this curse - what if we could brandish it against them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Congealed Blood of Sethe from Sethekk Holllow.
QuestData.CompletionText: My attempts to bottle the pooled blood have failed. It breaks down and dissipates when it is taken away from Sethe's bones.$B$BBut I have high hopes for this congealed form!
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent, excellent. Go ahead and drop those directly into the cauldron.
